title: Connection Request
message: Hi {personName}, I really impressed by the work at {companyName}. I love to connect and learn more about your role!

title: Job Inquiry
message: Hello {personName}, I came across an opportunity at {companyName} that aligns with my skills. I would appreciate any insights you could share!

title: Testing a new template
message: Here I am testing my first template {username} and then {company name} cool

title: Ryan's template
message:
Hi {person's name},

I hope you are doing well! I wanted to reach out because I recently came across an opportunity at {company name } for the (role)  (ID:{jobID}), and I thought it would be a great fit for my background.

I would appreciate it if you could refer me!

Best regards,
{Your name}
